meanings.definition: The fish population in a particular region.
meanings.sent1: The ichthyofaunas in the lake include various types of fish.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the ichthyofaunas in the river to understand the ecosystem better.
meanings.sent3: The ichthyofaunas in the pond decided to throw a fish party.
meanings.sent4: The ichthyofaunas in the ocean danced gracefully in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The colorful ichthyofaunas in the aquarium captivated the visitors.

meanings.definition: The study of fish populations in a specific area.
meanings.sent1: Marine biologists conduct research on ichthyofaunas to protect marine life.
meanings.sent2: Learning about ichthyofaunas helps us understand the impact of pollution on fish.
meanings.sent3: The class on ichthyofaunas turned into a fishy adventure.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the ichthyofaunas of the deep sea is like diving into a mystery.
meanings.sent5: The book on ichthyofaunas provided valuable insights into aquatic ecosystems.
